text: Lottia argrantesta is a species of limpet in the family Lottiidae. It was first described in 2003. It is native to the Gulf of California. ==References== ==External links== *Bouchet, P. (2015). Lottia argrantesta Simison & Lindberg, 2003. In: MolluscaBase (2015). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species. Category:Lottiidae Category:Gastropods described in 2003 Category:Marine fauna of the Gulf of California
title: Lottia argrantesta
